replies.msg: 情

My friend Celine is on her period so she cannot have cold drinks, coffee, ice cream and tomatoes right now. Her aunt flow is visiting. She has very painful cramps right now so she's going to take a.day of menstrual leave. Her sister also feels bloated which means her period is gonna come soon. She's had stomach cramps lately as well but her period is late this month; it's a week late. Today, she's been so emotional as it's that time of the month again. Her cousin Sarah missed her period so she might be pregnant. Her cousin's husband did his back workout this morning during which he overtrained his lats, middle back and lower back so he's got cramps in his back.
